column5: *Walk to Uptown bars & restaurants. 2 blocks from West Village and Mckinney Ave. *Close to DART City Place Station. *Private bathroom (detached) *Fast Wifi *Free gated parking *Located at entrance to Katy Trail. (Leads to AAC Center and SMU). *Great for business trips, couples and individuals wanting to meet other travelers like yourself. *High quality toiletries provided (shampoo/Conditioner, BW, lotion, etc) *Iron/Iron board, steamer, blow dryer provided.
column8: Uptown Room Walkable to Hot Spots
